text: Michael Begley may refer to: *Michael Begley (politician) (1932–2012), Irish Fine Gael politician *Michael Begley (rower) (1872–1938), American rower who won a medal at the 1904 Summer Olympics *Michael Joseph Begley (1909–2002), bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Charlotte, North Carolina, 1972–1984 *Michael Begley (actor), British actor and writer
title: Michael Begley
